reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 499/96: ADMINISTRATIVE DRIVER'S LICENCE SUSPENSION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 499/96: ADMINISTRATIVE DRIVER'S LICENCE SUSPENSION
reg_info.act_under: Highway Traffic Act   Code de la route

content.content: 1. A police officer, acting under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act, must notify the Registrar by any form of telecommunication. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. A police officer, acting under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act, must notify the Registrar by any form of telecommunication. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 1.

content.content: 2. A police officer, acting under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act may cause another police officer or a person employed by a police service to notify the Registrar. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. A police officer, acting under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act may cause another police officer or a person employed by a police service to notify the Registrar. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 2.

content.content: 3. The Registrar must be notified within 90 days after the day on which the person who is the subject of the notification was driving or had care, charge or control of a motor vehicle. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 3.
content.raw_html: 3. The Registrar must be notified within 90 days after the day on which the person who is the subject of the notification was driving or had care, charge or control of a motor vehicle. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 3.

content.content: 4. A police officer who has notified the Registrar or caused the Registrar to be notified under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act shall confirm the notice by completing a form provided by the Registrar for that purpose and shall forward the completed form to the Registrar as soon as practical after the notification by telecommunication. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 4.
content.raw_html: 4. A police officer who has notified the Registrar or caused the Registrar to be notified under subsection 48.3 (1) of the Act shall confirm the notice by completing a form provided by the Registrar for that purpose and shall forward the completed form to the Registrar as soon as practical after the notification by telecommunication. O. Reg. 499/96, s. 4.

content.content: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 499/96, s. 5.
content.raw_html: 5. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 499/96, s. 5.
